main event: On December 7, 1952, a group of three young men observed a bright oval-shaped object in the sky over Dallas, Texas, which made a 90-degree turn and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a basketball., The object was observed moving rapidly across the sky., Weather conditions were reported to be clear with unlimited visibility., The sighting was part of the Project Blue Book investigations conducted by the USAF., The investigation did not provide a conclusive explanation for the observed phenomenon.
